post.text: Incredibly touched by this video. Our American comeback story begins November 8th. We will Make America Great Again for everyone.

comment.author: Keely
comment.text: WTF.... Comey after saying it would take a long time reverses himself. FBI agent suspected of leakage dead from murder/suicide.... bad folks! OBAMA SANCTIFYING ILLEGAL VOTES AS PRIVATE... B.S.!

replies.author: Kimberly
replies.text: Shady Republicans were involved with this, no doubt. Whomever was involved, if found, should be removed from office, including Comey. Now, Godspeed, Madam President!
